title: Ethiopia's Tigray crisis: Accept our rule or no ceasefire, rebels say
content:
1. Ethiopia's Tigray crisis: Accept our rule or no ceasefire, rebels say  Yahoo News
  2. Ethiopia: Tigray rebels accept ceasefire but set out conditions  The Guardian
  3. ‘I Didn’t Expect to Make It Back Alive’: An Interview With Tigray’s Leader  The New York Times
  4. Opinion | How can Ethiopia claim to have laid down its arms when it continues to weaponize starvation?  The Washington Post
  5. Ethiopia's Tigray demands troop withdrawals for ceasefire talks  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: エチオピアのティグライ・クライシス。我々の支配を受け入れなければ停戦はできない、と反乱軍は言う
埃塞俄比亚的提格雷危机。叛军说，接受我们的统治，否则就不停火
埃塞俄比亞的提格雷危機。叛軍說，接受我們的統治，否則就不停火
